description: Describes a network device or switch.

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the network device

chassis_id.description: MAC address of the network device.

mgmt_ip.description: The management IP address of the network device.

mtu.description: The device level MTU. If interface MTU is not present this will be used as the default value.

port_id.description: The ifAlias of the network device.

admin_status.description: The administrative status of the interface.

oper_status.description: The operational status of the interface.

speed.description: The reported active speed of the interface.

mtu.description: Optional. The MTU of the interface.

label.description: Optional. Freeform string label for the network device
